page.title: 03Playground Games in Mellor.
page.content: Our playground games vary according to the weather.The game I play is pirates.It is a sort of tig game and you have to have three people or more to play British Buldog is all about dodging. Whoever he calls out,runs ,and the person who is on must try and catch them before they reach the other side. People get hurt but if you are cold it soon gets you warmed up and tired. I play Kings, Queens and Jacks.King means running, Queen means skipping and Jack means hopping. Sometimes we keep falling when we run and hop. Rasberry, Strawberry,Apple jam tart, Tell me the name of your sweet heart? ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ. Whichever letter you land on, you think of a boy's name beginning with that letter.I love singing skipping rhymes.
